title: Ghost Crossing - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Ghosts   Glasses-wearing Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Magic   Mystery Solving   Revenge

description: In order to live a long life, she has to complete 100 ghost ferrying missions. The Red Ghost! Pregnant ghosts! Water Ghost! Baby ghosts! —- Wait, ghosts, I’m coming to ferry you!>
